vulnerability.name: USN-7021-4
vulnerability.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - GPU drivers;   - BTRFS file system;   - F2FS file system;   - GFS2 file system;   - BPF subsystem;   - Netfilter;   - RxRPC session sockets;   - Integrity Measurement Architecture(IMA) framework; (CVE-2024-41009, CVE-2024-26677, CVE-2024-42160, CVE-2024-39494, CVE-2024-39496, CVE-2024-38570, CVE-2024-27012, CVE-2024-42228)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in the Linux kernel.
